name: Leann Serrano
about: Product was in good packaging and condition. All the items were in the pouch. The token with QR code verification worked well but the website shows chinese language. seller was responsive. The earphone is definitely a good deal in this price. Recommended.

name: Margery Whitaker
about: It was recommended by my friends that HM13 headphone is quite good as low mid range budget.The product seem good. I scratched & scanned the QR Code and it took me to the UiiSii Website.I hope its a genuine product.Bass quality and sound quality is impressive. Microphone works fine..

name: Obrien Christian
about: For this price this is a really good earphone.The voice quality is really good, also it has nice bass quality. If i compare with my gaming headphone, It may not be the same quality but those are really expensive headphones and this earphone costs only 300 BDT.Also it has half braided cable. but It'd be better if it was full braided cable However I'm satisfied with the audio quality I'd rate it 9/10

name: Schwartz Clay
about: Authentic product,,,100% good condition,Sound quality up to the mark,

name: Stanton Hanson
about: Super bass quality.(HM 13) New user on samsung A50s Mobile over all i am satisfied with the seller.thank you so much

name: Dean Merritt
about: Great product for this price but bass is terible for anyone who might take it for long time music listening (might even get headache)but voice input is good recommendable but with conditions .
